controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to be reasonably satisfied that each company customer exists and that beneficial ownership obligations (Part 4.12) are met?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for confirming company existence and beneficial ownership compliance

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the minimum KYC information for domestic companies: full name (as registered by ASIC), registered office address, principal place of business address (if any), ACN, company type (proprietary/public), and if proprietary, director names?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting minimum KYC information for domestic companies

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the minimum KYC information for registered foreign companies: full name (as registered by ASIC), registered office address in Australia, principal place of business in Australia or local agent details (if any), ARBN, country of formation, registration status and company type (private/public/other), and if private, director names?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting minimum KYC information for registered foreign companies

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the minimum KYC information for unregistered foreign companies: full name, country of formation, registration status with foreign body, and if registered: foreign identification number, full address in country of registration, company type (private/public/other), director names (if private), or if not registered: principal place of business address in country of formation?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for collecting minimum KYC information for unregistered foreign companies

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether any KYC information beyond the minimum (4.3.3) should be collected for a company?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to determining additional KYC information collection

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify the minimum information for domestic companies: full name (as registered by ASIC), company type (proprietary/public), and ACN?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying minimum information for domestic companies

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify the minimum information for registered foreign companies: full name (as registered by ASIC), registration status and company type (private/public), and ARBN?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying minimum information for registered foreign companies

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify the minimum information for unregistered foreign companies: full name, and if registered with foreign body: foreign identification number and company type (private/public)?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for verifying minimum information for unregistered foreign companies

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether any additional KYC information (beyond 4.3.5 minimum) should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to determining additional KYC information verification

controls.label: When determining what additional information to collect and/or verify (per 4.3.4/4.3.6), does your entity have regard to ML/TF risk relevant to the provision of the designated service?

Does your AML/CTF program include the simplified company verification procedure for domestic listed public companies, their majority-owned subsidiaries, or companies licensed and regulated by a Commonwealth, State or Territory statutory regulator?
controls.detail-label: Describe your simplified verification procedure, including methods to confirm the company's status (e.g., stock exchange search, public company documents, ASIC database search, regulator licence search)

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether and how to verify a foreign company's existence by confirming it is a foreign listed public company?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to verifying foreign listed public companies

controls.label: If your program includes foreign listed public company verification, does it require regard to ML/TF risk (including the location of the foreign stock exchange) when determining whether and how to use this method?

Does your AML/CTF program require that verification of company information be based as far as possible on reliable and independent documentation, reliable and independent electronic data, or a combination of both?
controls.detail-label: Describe the reliable and independent sources (documentation and/or electronic data) used to verify company information

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to determine whether to rely on a disclosure certificate to verify information about a foreign company where such information is not otherwise reasonably available?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to determining when to rely on disclosure certificates for foreign companies

controls.label: If your program allows disclosure certificates for foreign company verification, does it require regard to ML/TF risk including the jurisdiction of incorporation, jurisdiction of primary operations, and location of foreign stock exchange (if any)?
Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to respond to any discrepancy that arises during verification of company information?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to responding to verification discrepancies for companies

groups.title: General CDD Obligation
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to confirm the company exists and beneficial ownership obligations are met.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information required for each company type, plus risk-based additional collection.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Minimum verification requirements for each company type, plus risk-based additional verification.

groups.title: Simplified Verification for Listed/Regulated Companies
groups.description: Optional simplified procedure for domestic listed public companies, their majority-owned subsidiaries, and Commonwealth/State/Territory regulated companies.

groups.title: Foreign Listed Public Company Verification
groups.description: Optional risk-based procedure to verify foreign companies by confirming foreign listed public company status.

groups.title: Methods of Verification
groups.description: General verification standards and use of reliable independent sources.

groups.title: Disclosure Certificates for Foreign Companies
groups.description: Risk-based use of disclosure certificates when foreign company information is not otherwise reasonably available.

groups.title: Responding to Discrepancies
groups.description: Risk-based systems to respond to verification discrepancies.
